column1: 1. Adjust the bias values for each symbol in each reel (rows 4-9, columns C-F)
2. The probabilities will be automatically calculated (bias value รท total bias)
3. The RTP is calculated based on these probabilities
4. Modify the bias values until you achieve your target RTP (e.g., 97%)
- Increase bias of higher value symbols (A, K) and Jokers (X) to increase RTP
- Increase bias of lower value symbols (10, J) to decrease RTP
